TextView.android:text: In order to exploit the ICT in health care system, Pharmacy system app is build. Pharmacy system is robust, integrated technology. Pharmacy system deals with the maintenance of drugs and consumables in the pharmacy unit. The set-up of this pharmacy system will ensure availability of sufficient quantity of drugs. This will enhance the efficiency of clinical work. In addition, Pharmacy system will be able to process drug prescription with ease.

In general, The Pharmacy system is based on app technology that is managed by the pharmacist who give implementation of function relatively in effective times as well as will design for removing time wasting, saving resources, easy data access of the medicine, security on data input and data access by removing almost manual based system. The pharmacy management system is built for the sake of ensuring effective and clear data saving and manipulating as well as neat work on the pharmacy medical products.
